description: Some cool kids are skating around in the park behind the station.

Sell skateboard to skater.description: You force the kid to buy a new skateboard. You convince him that his skateboard is useless and needs a new one. He tries to bargain, but you want 20$ no matter what

Wait.description: Kids pretending to be cool around here. Can't even do an ollie.
That youngster looks like he is 50 years old
